The SRX (Super Robot Type-X or X-Type) Altered Banpreios is a fictional robot in the
Super Robot Wars
series. It appears as a playable unit in the 3rd Super Robot Wars Alpha.
Appearance
The Banpreios is a hulking machine that is not as boxy as its predecessor, the
SRX
. The Banpreios has a large head shaped like that of
Banpresto's logo. There is white on much of the body structure while there is a lot of blue on the upper body and arms and red on the legs. Its vents are clearly marked by being shaded in yellow.
Technical And Historical
For the full history of the SRX, see here.
The Banpreios is meant to be the final product of the
SRX Developmental Project
. This machine will finally allow the
Tronium Engine
to be used at full capacity without the worry of it having the side effect of potentially exploding (
Tronium
is a highly dangerous mineral). This way, the SRX is no longer a threat to its pilots and is an even deadlier foe in combat. Learning from the original SRX's success and mistakes, the Banpreios is allowed to become a well-developed and refined robot that brings its use of super robot and real robot qualities to a state close to perfection.
The Banpreios, like the SRX, is meant to be a combining robot that uses the R-1 Altered, R-2 Altered, and R-3 Altered. However, due to the war becoming so intense, the project is rushed and the Banpreios itself is sent out ahead of schedule. It is said in Alpha 3 the Banpreios is capable of separating, but this ability is sealed for the sake of time and to strengthen the mecha (in game terms, this is likely due to the limitations of Alpha 3's Squad System).
The Banpreios is armed with a variety of weaponry and can again use the
R-Gun Powered
as a weapon module. The pilots of the Banpreios upon rollout are
Raidiese F. Branstein (again maintaining the output of the Tronium Engine) and
Mai Kobayashi (who performs the T-Link Contact with the
T-Link
/
Uranus
systems). Once they reach
Ryusei Date , he takes his place as the primary pilot of the machine. When
Aya Kobayashi is recovered, she once again maintains the T-Link System, this time alongside her sister. With both Aya and Mai on board, Banpreios can use attacks that require "Twin Contact" with the T-Link System.
Specifications
Model Number: SR-01 SRX ALTERED
Height: 75.3 meters
Weight: 431.8 tons
Main Power Source: Tronium Engine
Defensive System:
Nendou Field
Weapon Systems:
Telekinesis Missiles HP The Banpreios unloads many missile pods that launch into a group of enemies and open up to reveal a load of small but strong explosives that spread out among the targets to damage them all while leaving any ally units in the blast area unharmed.''
High Palm Detonator Learning from the SRX, it seems it is more appropriate for the arm weapons to be fast-firing beam cannons in order to save energy and perform more accurate shots. These large beam cannons are located in each palm.''
Gaun Genocider The Banpreios fires a huge beam ray attack from its visor. The Banpresto logo sound effect can be heard when it fires and when it hits.''
T-LINK Blade Knuckle The Banpreios uses psychic energy to create energy blades on both arms. It uses them to repeatedly impale/punch the target before breaking one blade off inside the target and sending it flying backwards. The blade then explodes.''
Altered Full Burst A coordinated attack that utilizes the Telekenesis Missiles, High Palm Detonators, and Gaun Genocider to perform an all out attack.''
Tenjou Tenja Nendou Musou Ken (Heaven and Earth Psychic Matchless Sword) Ryusei's name for the Banpreios' ultimate sword attack. The blade-like protrusions on the feet detach and combine. They use Zol Orihalcon to create the Super Zol Orichalcon Sword. With this weapon, a devastating sword combination attack is used. The Banpreios first impales the enemy with the sword. When Ryusei issues the "Open Sword!" command, the two blades fold back, cutting the opponent in two. As a finishing strike, the blades revert back to the normal configuration and Banpreios cleaves through the enemy. This move is likely to be what was intended for the prototype's
R-Sword
module, given the similarities between the Super Zol Orichalcon Sword and the twin blades of the R-Sword.''
Tenjou Tenga Ichigeki Hissatsu Hou Kai (Heaven and Earth One Shot Sure Kill Cannon Improved) Similar to the original the SRX, R-Gun can be used as an additional weapon. This is actually known as the HTB Cannon (Hyper Tronium Buster Cannon), where the R-Gun transforms into its Metal Genocider Mode and is used as a giant gun for the Banpreios in which power from the Tronium Engine is relayed into the R-Gun to perform a devastating attack. With the limits on the Banpreios now almost non-existent, the Tronium engine can be powered to new heights to power this attack. In this version of the attack, an additional module called Ex-Gunner is deployed, and docked to the rear of the R-Gun Powered, but the exact functions of this unit, aside from making the machine look more like a proper rifle, are not specified.''
